english.segment1: Love is patient love is kind. You love me and you don't mind. When I'm not so perfect. You still patiently stand by
english.segment2: My actions fail to show. But in spite of me you seem to know. That I only want to love you. Cause I can't make it on my own
english.segment3: My words have cut you to the bone. But my heart still longs for you alone
english.segment4: Show me love, show me life, give me time. Because I want to shine in spite of who I am. Sow me love, give me time. Because I want to shine in spite of who I am
english.segment5: I know through you I am justified. But still I can't find the line. Where my works will match my faith. And I'll lay myself aside
english.segment6: My actions fail to show. But in spite of me you seem to know. That I only want to love you. Cause I can't make it on my own
english.segment7: When my mind denies the love I know. My life sends nails through your bone
english.segment8: Bridge. I can't define Your love but I need it I need it yeah. I can't give enough of me but You want it so I'll give. I don't deserve Your love but I have it, I have it now
